name: Caveman Feast Run
description:
Description: Caveman Feast Run is exciting running game where lonely caveman has to travel through the wild to reach his Meat. Help Caveman Run and Jump and kill some tigers mammoths and dinosaurs to reach his food. Feed some meat to the Caveman. He is not on diet. This fun, free Caveman games lets you help the Caveman run to his meat avoiding obstacles along the way.

Features:
- Running game with only one character.
- Endless running game
- Tap on the right to “fire” spear to kill obstacles.
- Fun, addictive and entertaining
-Awesome graphics

Download it and get prepared for a brave journey!
